text: David Michael Hasselhoff (born July 17, 1952), also known as "The Hoff", is an American actor, singer, producer, television personality, and businessman. He is best known for his lead roles in the popular 1980s show Knight Rider and in the 1990s series Baywatch. He was also in the eleventh season of Dancing with the Stars in September 2010. Hasselhoff was born in Baltimore. He grew up in Jacksonville, Florida and Atlanta, Georgia. == References == Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Baltimore Category:Actors from Jacksonville, Florida Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Singers from Baltimore Category:Singers from Jacksonville, Florida
title: David Hasselhoff
